annotations.description: There was no time for the supporters to get bored during the game as it was full of action and thrilling moments. The home side were superior in this game. The home team played possession football and the away players really focused on a well organized defence.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: That's all for today as the game is over.

annotations.description: The corner from Darijo Srna (Shakhtar) is intercepted by the defence.

Alex Teixeira (Shakhtar) picks up a pass and hits the ball towards the top of the net, but he can't generate enough power to trouble Keylor Navas. Good work from Shakhtar Donetsk as they win a corner.
The referee blows his whistle as Nacho (Real Madrid) was too aggressive in his challenge.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: Fourth official shows 3 min. of added time.

Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) unleashes a shot from the edge of the box, but it goes straight at Andrij Pyatov.

annotations.label: funfact
annotations.description: The total shots for both teams statistics – 25:5.
Ivan Bebek blows his whistle and it's Pepe (Real Madrid) who is penalised for an offensive foul. Good decision by the referee.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Isco (Real Madrid) launches the ball from the resulting corner, but one of the defenders is first to the ball and deals with the threat.

Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) fashions a shot from the edge of the box after receiving an accurate pass. Andrij Pyatov makes a stunning save to stop the effort from flying into the bottom right corner. Real Madrid will have a chance to score from a corner kick.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Mircea Lucescu has decided to introduce fresh legs, with Bernard (Shakhtar) replacing Oleksandr Gladky.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) gets to the rebound in the goalmouth and plants a header home.

Marcelo (Real Madrid) won himself some space after the corner kick and tries his luck with a shot from the edge of the box. His effort is directed to the middle of the goal, but the goalkeeper is alert and makes the save.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The ball goes out for a corner. Real Madrid can continue in their attacking effort.

Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) fails to produce a decent enough free kick for a player of his ability and the only target that he finds is the wall of defenders in front of him. Real Madrid will take a corner kick.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Ivan Bebek shows a yellow card to Maksym Malyshev (Shakhtar), who isn't surprised as the tackle was really hard and late.
Maksym Malyshev (Shakhtar) tackles a bit over zealously and Ivan Bebek blows for a foul. Real Madrid win a free kick. It's a promising situation for a direct shot.
Darijo Srna (Shakhtar) crosses the ball into the box, but one of the defending players averts the threat.
Maksym Malyshev (Shakhtar) makes a yard for himself on the edge of the box and produces a poor effort that sails miles wide of the left post.
Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) comes close to scoring. He meets a lovely lofted pass from Isco, but sends his close range header way over the crossbar.
Luka Modric (Real Madrid) delivers a fine lofted cross into the penalty area, but it's cleared by an opposing player.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Luka Modric (Real Madrid) works the corner short.

Daniel Carvajal (Real Madrid) sends a lofted cross into the penalty area. Unfortunately for him, the opponent's defence deals with his cross comfortably and intercepts it. It will be a corner kick for Real Madrid.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Olexandr Kucher (Shakhtar) sees a yellow card from Ivan Bebek after he sent one of the opposing players to the ground.

annotations.description: Substitution. Marlos is replaced by Viktor Kovalenko (Shakhtar).

That's a well taken pass by Karim Benzema (Real Madrid). He unleashes a strike from the edge of the box, but blazes it high over the bar.

annotations.description: Substitution. Taison will be replaced by Maksym Malyshev (Shakhtar).

Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) will take the responsibility and he is already preparing the ball.

annotations.description: The referee blows his whistle, a clear handball by Marcio Azevedo (Shakhtar). The advantage of a penalty kick is given to Real Madrid.

Olexandr Kucher (Shakhtar) makes a strong challenge and Ivan Bebek blows for a foul. Another situation results in a direct free kick for Real Madrid.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Nacho (Real Madrid) comes onto the pitch because Sergio Ramos simply cannot continue any longer after picking up an injury.
Isco (Real Madrid) receives a quality pass and unleashes a rocket of a shot from distance, but his amazing effort goes just over the crossbar. The goalkeeper probably wouldn't have saved this one.
What a wasted chance that is! An inch perfect cross into the box finds Oleksandr Gladky (Shakhtar) who sends his header well wide of the left post.
An opponent rises to his feet after being downed by Luka Modric (Real Madrid). Ivan Bebek saw the sliding tackle and blows for a foul.

Sergio Ramos (Real Madrid) has picked up a minor injury, but it looks like he will be able to continue.

annotations.description: Luka Modric (Real Madrid) takes the corner, but the opposition's defence is ready and clears the ball to safety.

annotations.description: Sergio Ramos (Real Madrid) requires medical treatment, so the referee stops play and signals for the physio to come onto the pitch.

annotations.description: Taras Stepanenko (Shakhtar) makes a bad challenge and is given a second yellow card which means he's off.
Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) commits a rough challenge and Ivan Bebek blows his whistle for a foul.
Shakhtar Donetsk keep possession of the ball with some short passes, waiting for the moment to hit the opposition swiftly on the break.
Luka Modric (Real Madrid) clearly handles the ball, but he is surprised when the referee blows his whistle.
Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) sends a cross into the box, but the opposition's defence quickly intercepts the ball.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Rafael Benitez has made a change at the break. Pepe (Real Madrid) has come on in place of Raphael Varane.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The game restarts for the second half.

There has not been much to choose between the sides after an absorbing 45 minutes. Let's hope they can continue in the same vein in the second period. The home side were more active and dominant in the first half. The opposition found it tough to keep up. The home team makes a lot of passes and attempts to maintain possession. As for the away side, it's obvious that defence has the highest priority for them.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The referee blows his whistle to end the first half and the players are now heading to their respective dressing rooms.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: We will have 1 min. of added time.
A cross into the box from Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) is cleared.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) once again attempts to send a defence splitting pass, but the opposition's defence is alert and intercepts the ball.
Marcelo (Real Madrid) attempts to find Cristiano Ronaldo, but puts far too much on the pass and the chance is gone.
Marcio Azevedo (Shakhtar) times his run too early and the linesman raises his flag for offside.
What a chance that is! Luka Modric (Real Madrid) finds himself unmarked in a promising position after receiving a cross on the edge of the box and his attempt sails a whisker wide of the right post.
Alex Teixeira (Shakhtar) releases Oleksandr Gladky, who latched on to his perfect through pass and can continue with his team's attack.
Daniel Carvajal (Real Madrid) goes on a solo run, but he fails to create a chance as an opposition player blocks him. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Shakhtar Donetsk.
Marcio Azevedo (Shakhtar) races towards goal but the defender gets back well to make a challenge. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Real Madrid.
Mateo Kovacic (Real Madrid) looks to break free, but an opposing player clears the ball away.
Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) tries to send a pass but it's blocked.
That was a poorly executed free kick from long distance. Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) was trying to produce a cross into the penalty area, but his effort sailed off the pitch.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! It's a catastrophic error from the opponent which has gifted a chance to Karim Benzema (Real Madrid), who rolls the ball into the back of the net from close range. 1:0.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: The game is interrupted now, Gareth Bale (Real Madrid) picks up a knock and the physio has to come on.
Isco (Real Madrid) delivers a low pass into the box which is intercepted.

Flag goes up against Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) and the referee blows his whistle for offside. The referee blows his whistle for offside.
Fred (Shakhtar) smashes the ball upfield and Marcio Azevedo controls it with a great first touch.

The ball is cleared after Daniel Carvajal (Real Madrid) attempted to dribble past an opposing player.
Alex Teixeira (Shakhtar) tries to slide the ball through to a teammate but it's well blocked by a defender.
An attempted cross from Marcelo (Real Madrid) is cleared. The ball goes out of play and Shakhtar Donetsk will have a goal kick.
Another attempt to send the ball beyond the defence by Gareth Bale (Real Madrid) is thwarted and cleared to safety.
Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) receives a pass and decides to smash the ball from long range. His poor effort sails well wide of the left post.
Daniel Carvajal (Real Madrid) slides a pass forward, but one of the defenders cuts it out.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) attempts to test the goalkeeper after receiving a cross inside the penalty area. He hits the ball poorly and his shot goes well wide of the right post.
Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) makes a yard for himself inside the box after an accurate pass and takes a shot that goes just over the crossbar.

Gareth Bale (Real Madrid) receives a lofted pass and is given time inside the box to unleash a shot goalwards. The ball is directed to the bottom left corner, but it lacks power and Andrij Pyatov pulls off a comfortable save to thwart the effort.
The linesman signals that Alex Teixeira (Shakhtar) is offside and the referee confirms the decision.
The Shakhtar Donetsk players are exchanging short passes in an attempt to create a shooting opportunity.
Marcio Azevedo (Shakhtar) shoots after receiving a good pass. His effort from the edge of the box goes just wide of the left post.
Marcelo (Real Madrid) receives a lofted pass from out wide and shoots from close range, but the ball flies way over the crossbar.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) switches the play to Marcelo and their attacking move continues.
Raphael Varane (Real Madrid) reacts well near the penalty spot to connect with the resulting corner, but fails to direct his header into the back of the net. The ball floats high over the bar.
